website_summaries.verdict: An unbeatable price with great durability and construction for occasional use.

customer_reviews.title: Used for 2 projects and spring fell out
customer_reviews.text: I would not suggest buying this pipe wrench. I bought the 10" and 14" and used them for 2 projects around the house. The metal sleeve and spring fell out on both of them during the second use. You can probably find a way to get it put back together but it's awkward and I just don't want to deal with it if it's going to continue to break. Buy something else.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: FINALLY! SOLUTION TO STUCK SHOWERHEAD
customer_reviews.text: This pipe wrench is amazing, and solved my stuck showerhead dilemma. Moved into a new older house, showerheads reminded me of 1950s motel. Used heavy duty channel locks, Liquid Wrench solvent, Calcium Lime Rust & not even a budge when trying to remove old showerheads. Assumed were soldered on, would have to hire a plumber. This tool took them off without any scratching in two minutes. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Analytical VTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the price
customer_reviews.text: I gave it 5 stars due to the fact that this pipe wrench works very well when compared to the fact that it is inexpensive. However, a higher quality and higher priced pipe wrench performs much better. If you want a product that will get the job done for a decent price, this will work. If your going to be doing a lot of plumbing then it's probably wise to invest in something a bit better.
customer_reviews.author: EC

customer_reviews.title: Quick for removing stuck broken shower head  👍
customer_reviews.text: Awesome 😎 wrench quick for removing a stubborn @ss broken shower 🚿 head. The weight of it was a little difficult hold and using it overhead 🤷‍♀️🤣. But it made for quick work so it doesn’t really matter. I suppose if it was too light it would have bent or easily broken.
customer_reviews.author: angelina T

customer_reviews.title: Bought this to put on our work truck and it ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to put on our work truck and it gets used at least once a week in some muddy wet conditions. So far it has worked flawlessly and the teeth grip the pipe and do not slip of, even when using a cheater pipe for more leverage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great price, sturdy wrench
customer_reviews.text: Great wrench for the price. I bought this for my son-in-law, who is removing all the 75-year-old pipes in their basement from a no-longer-used radiator heating system. The wrench does a good job getting a grip on the pipes, and seems very sturdily made, even when subjected to "persuasion" blows from a small sledge hammer on the end of the handle. So far so good!
customer_reviews.author: BurghMan

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: So I finally use this for a new faucet in sink I installed today the arm length is pretty long but it's easy to adjust the width when I need to tighten different size flanges cell this was great
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Great wrench, but check local Wal-Mart first, found same for $9.99
customer_reviews.text: PRO: 1. Just the right size. 2. Shipping was fast. 3. Bright yellow, so I can find it easy. CON: 1. Found the same size at Wal-Mart for 9.99. 2. Little lighter than I expected, but works great. OTHER: 1. Check your local Wal-Mart, they have the same in RED, for a few bucks cheaper. 2. Paint may chip off, but who cares, it's a pipe wrench.
customer_reviews.author: Blaydese

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Wrench
customer_reviews.text: Needed for a plumbing job and worked exactly as desired. Good quality wrench. Nice weight to it. Gripped on very well to make the adjustments needed.
customer_reviews.author: Gaazmon

customer_reviews.title: Better than the more expensive ones
customer_reviews.text: This wrench is 10 times better than the more expensive one I brought from Lowe's. Very well made and looks like it will last
customer_reviews.author: SCBFSU

customer_reviews.title: Grabs and holds well
customer_reviews.text: I recently used this for the first time. My power auger corkscrewed into a hole I was digging and in order to "unscrew" it from the ground, I took this pipe wrench and a piece of pipe for leverage, and unwound it. This wrench grabbed well and never slipped.
customer_reviews.author: Earl

customer_reviews.title: Worthless/Loose Jaw
customer_reviews.text: Very heavy and I am sure it will last forever whether I want it to or not. The bottom jaw like part that you can adjust is VERY loose. When you adjust the width to fit it doesn't stay. Sad to say it was worthless.
customer_reviews.author: mplsshihtzulvr

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy tool...
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a big user of tools but this baby came in handy when I needed to remove a stuck shower head. I used so many different things to get the shower head removed and nothing worked. I order this with the same day delivery option. This tool was sturdy and heavy. Nice quality. I tightened this around the connection to the shower head and viola...it loosened up and came off.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Gonzales-Sage

customer_reviews.title: works well, big and heavy
customer_reviews.text: needed this to unscrew a stubborn shower head. this thing is huge and very heavy. now it lives under my bed as a weapon in case someone breaks in lol
customer_reviews.author: Basil

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. The thimble for jaw does not shake loose. Key note: Pipe wrenches are not to be used as hammers. Every time you drop it or hammer with it WILL mess it up, and you shouldn't whine about it its quality if this is the case. The paint coating is OK. They could have used a higher quality powder coating to make it stick. Its good that the paint coating is not "slick."
customer_reviews.author: PCTracer

customer_reviews.title: Not Durable
customer_reviews.text: The wrench worked well for about a year, then it would not grip the pipe anymore. The spring part fell off the jaw, and I could not get it back in. I just threw it in the scrap pile and bought a RIDGID for $40.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. David J. Liu

customer_reviews.title: Great Tool
customer_reviews.text: Great tool and made to last. I used it today to remove a leaking shower valve. Without it I wouldn't have been able to do the job. My big channel locks just slipped on the brass sleeve holding the valve in place.
customer_reviews.author: Doc Brown

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: The wrench has worked good so far but I am worried itll break soon if I had to do another project with it. We've only used it to tighten our kitchen sink so far
customer_reviews.author: James Deshaies

customer_reviews.title: Good deal!
customer_reviews.text: Its a pipe wrench, worked as its supposed to. I'd buy it for this price (about $14) again should it disappear.
customer_reviews.author: Tim B

customer_reviews.title: YES!  BIG AND CHEAP.  SOLID!
customer_reviews.text: I only use this once or twice per year, but WOW is it great to have, when U need it.
customer_reviews.author: spanky

customer_reviews.title: Its a pipe wrench
customer_reviews.text: Good wrench, helped me get an old hose off the spicket outside. The prior owner had just cut the hose because they couldn't get it off. I ordered it just for that, but have gotten some further use out of it. All in all it's just a pipe-wrench, seems well made though
customer_reviews.author: cory

customer_reviews.title: It will break.
customer_reviews.text: First time I used it it snapped and almost killed me
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Nordstrom

customer_reviews.title: Impressive results for such a low price, makes replacing ...
customer_reviews.text: Impressive results for such a low price, makes replacing office chair pistons an absolute cinch! My only qualm was that mine had a bit of paint missing, but ya know, for a $12 bludgeoning weapon which doubles as a chair repair tool, I think I'll manage.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Essentially worthless
customer_reviews.text: Adjustmebt is too loose to be useful. Get yourself something else, probably more expensive, that will actually work. This thing is junk.
customer_reviews.author: Eric T

customer_reviews.title: Good value, iffy quality
customer_reviews.text: Like a lot of other reviews, this product is great considering the low price! But assumingly due to that the quality suffers. I bought this for one purpose and only have used it once so far. Unlike others, mine has yet to break. Fingers crossed lol
customer_reviews.author: Deanna Salzman

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous in a library
customer_reviews.text: COL Mustard approved, although I am still partial to the Conservatory and Lead Pipes.
customer_reviews.author: Cheeseloaf

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's cheap and feels cheap but for the price no complaints so far
customer_reviews.author: Evil Monkey

customer_reviews.title: Great Wrench
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my Tow Hitch nut; and its fits great and its double the size in fitting around the nut. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: MITCHELL SMITH

customer_reviews.title: Bulky and finicky
customer_reviews.text: This wrench is so heavy and the screw to tighten/loosen is very finicky and gets caught/stuck.
customer_reviews.author: Customer1

customer_reviews.title: Recommended pipe wrench
customer_reviews.text: I've had it for a year and a half now and it still works perfectly. It holds a great grip and it supports a wide range, perfect for what I had to do.
customer_reviews.author: OML

customer_reviews.title: I live in a small condo so these were too ...
customer_reviews.text: I live in a small condo so these were too big for me to use under my sink. But they are heavy and feel strong
customer_reviews.author: Lllb91

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: its a pipe wrench. I used it on a water heater. worked well. I mean, obviously.
customer_reviews.author: chrisp339

customer_reviews.title: Seems really high quality and HEAVY duty. I bought ...
customer_reviews.text: Seems really high quality and HEAVY duty. I bought it for my plumber who always helps me with my properties.
customer_reviews.author: Vegas Laura

customer_reviews.title: Great pipe wrench
customer_reviews.text: I really like this pipe wrench. Price is great too. Amazing quality. Others I work with were impressed. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew K.

customer_reviews.title: pipe wrench
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to fix my washing machine since my husband passed away ,its up to me to fix things now. It worked perfect. I've never heard of this brand Tradespro but it seems to be a made real good and will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: granny Glay

customer_reviews.title: Wobbly head is wobbly
customer_reviews.text: Wobbly head takes a bit of tweaking to make sure it works. I'm concerned I'll probably strip the fittings I work on if I'm not careful. Echo'ing the other person who said wobbly head "I guess you get what you pay for."
customer_reviews.author: MonikerLewinsky

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Very sturdy without being cumbersome. Perfect for the drain cap we have. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: Stuart Kingham

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Nice product, item was exactly as described. I would definitely recommend this to others.
customer_reviews.author: Russell

customer_reviews.title: Worked Great
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for the small project I needed it for! Don't hesitate to buy it although I would recommend a more expensive one if your using it on a normal basis.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Removed my 2" radiator in no time.
customer_reviews.text: Only used this once, it did what it needed to and saved me $100 to hire a handyman.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: A great tool to own
customer_reviews.text: I used it to loosen the end cap from a natural gas line and it worked very well for this purpose. It is quite heavy, but I think that's to be expected, and as a result, it will also be quite handy to bash zombies in the head when the apocalypse comes (think dual purpose!).
customer_reviews.author: Pedro

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, heavy duty tool
customer_reviews.text: Nothing fancy here, just a good, solid wrench that gets the job done at a very affordable price.
customer_reviews.author: M. Lambert

customer_reviews.title: Manly tool for manly jobs!
customer_reviews.text: When you need some leverage, this is sure to help. I haven't tackled anything with this that hasn't lost the battle to this tool. Adjustment mechanism works well, and the teeth grip very well. Mostly used for removing nuts from mower blades, and it makes those rusty, gunky nuts a piece of cake.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Fox

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Used a pair of these to do a tub/shower repair and worked well to loosen fixtures. Solid and well made wrenches.
customer_reviews.author: Bill White

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works well, used it on a stuck cap drain for my boiler water expansion tank.
customer_reviews.author: Doughboy

customer_reviews.title: Now THIS is a pipe wrench
customer_reviews.text: You could probably use it as a lethal weapon pretty easily, but it also works well as a pipe wrench. Definitely improvement from my old, cheap pipe wrench. Solid quality, great value.
customer_reviews.author: dk

customer_reviews.title: Time saving design, quick to adjust as you work, and a strong grip on pipe and fittings.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent grip from sharp teeth inside jaws, just enough play so you can "ratchet" to save time using this on pipe, and it is easy to adjust as you work with it.
customer_reviews.author: JimBob1

customer_reviews.title: Great for price
customer_reviews.text: Got it to remove a stubborn fitting. 24 inch wrench for under 20, the price is amazing. Will fill in details later. I'm not an expert on wrenches, just got it for small home repair, so it is a great deal for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Deal or No Deal

customer_reviews.title: Awesome pipe wrench
customer_reviews.text: It seems we were always needing this product and you look around and don't have one. I purchased this for all the tightening pipe needs under your sinks and it has many other uses. Other than being a bit heavy, it has come in handy on many occasions.
customer_reviews.author: E. Parduhn

customer_reviews.title: I was able to remove the bathtub spout and adjust ...
customer_reviews.text: I was able to remove the bathtub spout and adjust the sink pipes to eliminate the jumpy water problem.
customer_reviews.author: PX

customer_reviews.title: One twist and the bolt I couldn't remove came off ...
customer_reviews.text: One twist and the bolt I couldn't remove came off. I tried 5 other wrenches and finally got my job done!
customer_reviews.author: Cokarob

customer_reviews.title: Working Wrench
customer_reviews.text: It's a wrench made of steel. What more can you ask for?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty
customer_reviews.text: Very well made, sturdy product. It is also very comfortable to use. A must have for any tool box.
customer_reviews.author: ChefKronk

customer_reviews.title: Strong wrench
customer_reviews.text: Used this to change out the gas cylinder in an office chair. The cylinder was stuck really good, was going at it with a hammer for a while before ordering this. This wrench took it out in 5 seconds.
customer_reviews.author: Ld

customer_reviews.title: at a good
customer_reviews.text: This is "the big unfastener" - plenty of torque can be applied by us oldsters, at a good price
customer_reviews.author: Ralph D. Blakeslee

customer_reviews.title: Meets My Expectations For Occassional Use
customer_reviews.text: It works fine. Have not had any problems. Maybe a little on the heavy side. I have only used it a few times, so for occasional use, it is a very good value.
customer_reviews.author: MDN

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: What can you say about a wrench?? It.....works. It got the job done. :)
customer_reviews.author: BethanyG

customer_reviews.title: Worked so easily. Great quality and price
customer_reviews.text: Needed this to remove a stubborn shower head in my apartment. Worked so easily. Great quality and price.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, strong, and let me finish my job. What more can I ask for!

customer_reviews.title: Great value for recreational user
customer_reviews.text: Great pipe wrench for the price. Yellow makes it easy to see. Ideal for someone like me who doesn't use one that often.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Works well!
customer_reviews.text: Solid and grips well. able to get around all sorts of household plumbing pipes. Perfect for DIY projects
customer_reviews.author: Sgshi

customer_reviews.title: It's already outlasted the 36" Tekton we bought at the ...
customer_reviews.text: It's already outlasted the 36" Tekton we bought at the same time (doing the same work). Will likely try the next size up now that I'm in the market for one of those again.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley Sebastian

customer_reviews.title: Arrived in obviously used condition (and dirty packaging) - I intended to buy a brand-new
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in obviously used condition (and dirty packaging) - I intended to buy a brand-new. Keeping it because too much trouble to return and it works.
customer_reviews.author: El

customer_reviews.title: Good wrench
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised by the quality of the wrench. My husband used it to put carrier bearings in my four wheeler and it worked as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Baller_14

customer_reviews.title: Good wrench for the money.
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used it much but it seems to be a good wrench for the money. I am an HVAC contractor and at this point I would not hesitate to purchase another one.
customer_reviews.author: emr

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I needed a big wrench for a single job - replacing a rusted-on steam radiator valve. Wrenches this size typically cost 3-5 times the price of this one. It did its job and saved me a plumber service charge. Even if I never use it again it was well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Man With Dog

customer_reviews.title: so it's great!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't have a wrench large enough to be able to connect some of my washer hoses, so I picked this up. It did the job, so it's great!
customer_reviews.author: J.R.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty and good quality, the long handle makes it easier to get job done.

customer_reviews.title: Big, strong pipe wrench
customer_reviews.text: A tool to get the job done. Used it to free a broken copper tap before there was nothing to grip on.

customer_reviews.title: wobbly head
customer_reviews.text: it is a bit wobbly and does not provide good grip for certain applications. But you get what you pay for :)

customer_reviews.title: Great wrench!!
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, grips well, nice pipe wrench- especially for the price!!

customer_reviews.title: Great wrench!
customer_reviews.text: Great wrench, nice and sturdy. Been using it loads around the house. TY!

customer_reviews.title: My what a big tool.
customer_reviews.text: Great tool at a good price. Did the job I needed it too perfectly. Money well spent.

customer_reviews.title: so that's good!
customer_reviews.text: It works just as you'd expect. It is a light-weight metal alloy, but feels strong enough. I haven't broke it yet, so that's good!

customer_reviews.title: It's a sad situation when China is producing high quality steel tools ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a sad situation when China is producing high quality steel tools at a crazy low price, and the US can't compete. Get it while you can because this isn't sustainable.

customer_reviews.title: teeth provide good grip and the handle provides decent
customer_reviews.text: Beast, teeth provide good grip and the handle provides decent leverage

customer_reviews.text: Perfectly acceptable large wrench. Seems solid and well made. The 24 inch measurement must be with the jaws fully open.

He has always treated us well, and I recently noticed that his wrenches were in bad shape (came to find out an ex-employee walked off with some of his better things). I have seen him a number of times since giving these to him, and he has mentioned that they have really come in handy, and he is very happy with the quality. I'm considering buying one or two for myself now.

customer_reviews.title: This is a good wrench I've used it at work now for about ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a good wrench I've used it at work now for about 6 months and haven't had any issues with it. The cheap ones I was buying from Walmart all were broken by the 6 month mark.
customer_reviews.author: Justin smedley

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I really do not have a day-to-day need for this type of wrench. However, I needed to remove a gas cylinder on a office chair where the tilt mechanism had broken and the gas cylinder had to be removed from the title plate before the plate could be removed from the chair. I do have the needed tools to do the job. After watching a YouTube on how to remove a gas cylinder it was evident I needed a heavy duty pipe wrench to do the job,. So it was worth the $12 to get the wrench in order to remove the cylinder. It did the job for me in quick time (and I am a terrible maintenance guy).
customer_reviews.author: Leod Mann

customer_reviews.title: Solid, essential tool.  Works as expected.
customer_reviews.text: What's not to like? Solid, essential tool. Works as expected.

customer_reviews.title: Oh yeah...

product_meta.title: Tradespro 830914 14-Inch Heavy Duty Pipe Wrench
product_meta.description:
Size:14-inchTradespro Tools by Alltrade Tools LLC is a global leader in the design, manufacturing and marketing of tools and shop equipment. Founded in 1979, the Long Beach, California based firm is privately held, with global manufacturing and sales facilities serving customers on every continent. The company's mission statement: Alltrade designs, markets and supplies tools and shop equipment that meet and exceed our customers' expectations of quality, service and value, while achieving profits to ensure the Company's and its employees' future growth and development. Alltrade offers our customers innovation, flexibility and speed to market.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Tradespro 830914 14-Inch Heavy Duty Pipe Wrench.
